name: Dungeons & Dice-men - Game Jam Edition
description:
"Dungeons & Dice-men" is a dungeon crawler dice game where you battle through the Dice Lord's volcano as he sends swathes of his Dice Men to kill you. Play as Dibby, a valiant Dice Knight through the depths of the volcano.

This game was developed in 48 hours for the Game Maker's Toolkit 2022 Game Jam by a team of 2:

  • Programming + unity development by  George Hutchcocks
  • Game Artwork by Hollie Walton

All Sound was sourced from free online sources.
